26  class KSComponentMinimumAtData
27  {
28  public:
29  std::string fName;
30  std::string fGroupName;
31  std::string fParentName;
32  std::string fSourceName;
33  };
34 
35  KSComponent* BuildOutputMinimumAt( KSComponent* aComponent, KSComponent* aSource )
36  {
37 
38 #define BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, xSOURCE ) \
39  if(( aComponent->Is< xVALUE >() == true ) && ( aSource->Is< xSOURCE >() == true )) \
40  { \
41  return new KSComponentMinimumAt< xVALUE, xSOURCE >( \
42  aComponent, aComponent->As< xVALUE >(), aSource->As< xSOURCE >() ); \
43  }
44 
45 #define BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( xVALUE ) \
46  if( aComponent->Is< xVALUE >() == true ) \
47  { \
48  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, bool ) \
49  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, unsigned char ) \
50  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, char ) \
51  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, unsigned short ) \
52  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, short ) \
53  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, unsigned int ) \
54  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, int ) \
55  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, unsigned long ) \
56  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, long ) \
57  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, float ) \
58  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, double ) \
59  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, KTwoVector ) \
60  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, KThreeVector ) \
61  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, KTwoMatrix ) \
62  BUILD_OUTPUT( xVALUE, KThreeMatrix ) \
63  }
64 
65  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( bool )
66  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( unsigned char )
67  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( char )
68  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( unsigned short )
69  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( short )
70  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( unsigned int )
71  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( int )
72  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( unsigned long )
73  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( long )
74  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( float )
75  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( double )
76  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( KTwoVector )
77  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( KThreeVector )
78  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( KTwoMatrix )
79  BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS( KThreeMatrix )
80 
81 #undef BUILD_OUTPUT_CLASS
82 #undef BUILD_OUTPUT
83 
84  return NULL;
85  }
86 
87  typedef KComplexElement< KSComponentMinimumAtData > KSComponentMinimumAtBuilder;
88 
89  template< >
90  inline bool KSComponentMinimumAtBuilder::Begin()
91  {
92  fObject = new KSComponentMinimumAtData;
93  return true;
94  }
95 
96  template< >
97  inline bool KSComponentMinimumAtBuilder::AddAttribute( KContainer* aContainer )
98  {
99  if( aContainer->GetName() == "name" )
100  {
101  std::string tName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
102  fObject->fName = tName;
103  return true;
104  }
105  if( aContainer->GetName() == "group" )
106  {
107  std::string tGroupName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
108  fObject->fGroupName = tGroupName;
109  return true;
110  }
111  if( aContainer->GetName() == "component" )
112  {
113  objctmsg( eWarning ) <<"deprecated warning in KSComponentMinimumAtBuilder: Please use the attribute <parent> instead <component>"<<eom;
114  std::string tParentName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
115  fObject->fParentName = tParentName;
116  return true;
117  }
118  if( aContainer->GetName() == "parent" )
119  {
120  std::string tParentName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
121  fObject->fParentName = tParentName;
122  return true;
123  }
124  if( aContainer->GetName() == "source" )
125  {
126  std::string tSourceName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
127  fObject->fSourceName = tSourceName;
128  return true;
129  }
130  return false;
131  }
132 
133  template< >
134  inline bool KSComponentMinimumAtBuilder::End()
135  {
136  KSComponent* tParentComponent = NULL;
137  KSComponent* tSourceComponent = NULL;
138  if( fObject->fGroupName.empty() == false )
139  {
140  KSComponentGroup* tComponentGroup = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponentGroup >( fObject->fGroupName );
141  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tComponentGroup->ComponentCount(); tIndex++ )
142  {
143  KSComponent* tGroupComponent = tComponentGroup->ComponentAt( tIndex );
144  if( tGroupComponent->GetName() == fObject->fParentName )
145  {
146  tParentComponent = tGroupComponent;
147  }
148  if( tGroupComponent->GetName() == fObject->fSourceName )
149  {
150  tSourceComponent = tGroupComponent;
151  }
152  }
153  if( tParentComponent == NULL )
154  {
155  objctmsg( eError ) << "component minimum_at builder could not find component <" << fObject->fParentName << "> in group <" << fObject->fGroupName << ">" << eom;
156  return false;
157  }
158  if( tSourceComponent == NULL )
159  {
160  objctmsg( eError ) << "component minimum_at builder could not find component <" << fObject->fSourceName << "> in group <" << fObject->fGroupName << ">" << eom;
161  return false;
162  }
163  }
164  else
165  {
166  tParentComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >( fObject->fParentName );
167  tSourceComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >( fObject->fSourceName );
168  }
169  KSComponent* tComponent = BuildOutputMinimumAt( tParentComponent, tSourceComponent );
170  tComponent->SetName( fObject->fName );
171  delete fObject;
172  Set( tComponent );
173  return true;
174  }
175 
176 }
177 
178 #endif
